purchaseEvents.title: Tech Temptation
purchaseEvents.narrative: Walking past an electronics store, a sleek new smartphone catches your eye. The latest model with features you don't need but suddenly want. Your current phone works fine, but the allure of something new pulls at you.

options.text: Buy the new phone
Walk away, it's just a distraction

purchaseEvents.title: Creative Opportunity
purchaseEvents.narrative: A flyer on a community board catches your attention: "Express Yourself: Evening Art Classes for Beginners." Something stirs inside you at the thought of creating something with your hands, of learning a new skill just for the joy of it.

options.text: Sign up for the class
Take the flyer but decide later

purchaseEvents.title: Daily Ritual
purchaseEvents.narrative: The barista at your regular coffee shop smiles as you approach. "Want to try our premium single-origin today? It's a few dollars more, but it's incredible." It's a small luxury, but one that might brighten your morning routine.

options.text: Treat yourself to the premium coffee
Stick with your usual order

purchaseEvents.title: Live Music
purchaseEvents.narrative: A band you used to love is playing in town this weekend. Their music was the soundtrack to a different chapter of your life, before responsibilities piled up. Tickets aren't cheap, but the nostalgia value might be worth it.

options.text: Buy a ticket to the show
Listen to their album at home instead

purchaseEvents.title: Social Invitation
purchaseEvents.narrative: A colleague you've always gotten along with invites you to dinner with some friends. "Nothing fancy, just good food and better company," they say. It would be an opportunity to expand your social circle beyond the office.

options.text: Accept the invitation
Politely decline, you need alone time

purchaseEvents.title: Digital Mindfulness
purchaseEvents.narrative: An ad for a premium meditation app appears on your screen. "Find your center in just 10 minutes a day," it promises. The free version has been helpful, but the premium features could offer deeper guidance for your increasingly scattered thoughts.

options.text: Subscribe to the premium version
The free version is enough

purchaseEvents.title: Giving Back
purchaseEvents.narrative: On your way home, you pass a volunteer collecting for a local shelter. Their genuine smile and the simple "Thank you" they offer to each donor makes you pause. It's been a while since you've contributed to something larger than yourself.

options.text: Make a donation
Smile and walk past

purchaseEvents.title: Literary Escape
purchaseEvents.narrative: In a bookstore window, you spot a novel by an author you've been meaning to read. The reviews promise it's the kind of story that stays with you long after the last page. Your to-read pile at home is already towering, but this one calls to you.

options.text: Buy the book
Make a note to get it from the library later

purchaseEvents.title: Skill Building
purchaseEvents.narrative: An email arrives advertising a weekend workshop on a skill that could advance your career. It's not cheap, and it means giving up your weekend, but it could pay dividends in your professional life.

options.text: Register for the workshop
Save the money and the weekend

purchaseEvents.title: Reconnection
purchaseEvents.narrative: A notification reminds you it's an old friend's birthday. You haven't spoken in years, lives diverging as they often do. A quick message would be easy, but a phone call would mean more, even if it feels awkward after so long.

options.text: Make the call, catch up properly
Send a quick text message

purchaseEvents.title: Digital Escape
purchaseEvents.narrative: Everyone at work is talking about a new series on a streaming service you don't subscribe to. The monthly fee is reasonable, but it's one more digital distraction in a life already full of screens.

options.text: Sign up for the service
Find something to watch on services you already have

purchaseEvents.title: Green Companion
purchaseEvents.narrative: Walking past a small plant nursery, you notice a display of low-maintenance houseplants. Your living space could use some life, and there's something appealing about nurturing something, even if it's just a simple plant.

options.text: Buy a plant for your home
Keep walking, one more thing to take care of

purchaseEvents.title: Musical Aspirations
purchaseEvents.narrative: In a store window, an acoustic guitar catches your eye. You used to play in college but set it aside for more "practical" pursuits. The muscle memory might still be there, waiting to be reawakened.

options.text: Buy the guitar, reconnect with music
Maybe another time

purchaseEvents.title: Professional Support
purchaseEvents.narrative: A business card in your wallet reminds you of the therapist a friend recommended months ago. You've been putting it off, but maybe now is the time to talk to someone objective about the crossroads you find yourself at.

options.text: Schedule a session
You can handle this on your own
